plot: A hard-edged cop, a legendary mafia hitman, and a martial arts champion, go after a mythical mob boss with their private vendettas, each willing to pay the ultimate price for vengeance.
title: Avengeance
plot_es: A hard-edged cop, a legendary mafia hitman, and a martial arts champion, go after a mythical mob boss with their private vendettas, each willing to pay the ultimate price for vengeance.
plot_en: A hard-edged cop, a legendary mafia hitman, and a martial arts champion, go after a mythical mob boss with their private vendettas, each willing to pay the ultimate price for vengeance.
